alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 10:57PM EST until January 05 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues or the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Elliston down to Hazleton. Wabash River at Lafayette down to Riverton. Mississinewa River at Ridgeville. .Antecedent soil moisture...and upwards of an additional one and a half inches of rainfall this weekend...has returned several rivers to flood. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.6 feet, Jackson County Sheriff`s additional roads closed: CR 25 N through Honeytown, Slab Road between the river and Ewing, Rockford Road near the skating rink, SR 235 from Medora to Indiana 135 possible conflict with Sheriff`s report. All these closing found in the republic.com site published in Columbus, IN. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 15.4 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Sunday.
